body_html:
No, we rely on a cluster manager such as Kubernetes to restart crashed processes. See the KubeFlow project for a high-level example of using Kubernetes to manage a set of TensorFlow jobs:

https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow

https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow
body:
No, we rely on a cluster manager such as Kubernetes to restart crashed processes. See the KubeFlow project for a high-level example of using Kubernetes to manage a set of TensorFlow jobs:

https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow
